title: Play rugby series. No. 10. [Team play]
creator_credit: John Dobson, British Broadcasting Corporation and John Rickword
brief_description: Demonstrates the techniques of good team play for a successful, winning, try-scoring team. Rugby football is a hard physical contact game and players need to act within the ethics and rules of the game, but also must be prepared to take risks within the rules of the game.
creator_credit_for_label: John Dobson, British Broadcasting Corporation and John Rickword
